title: Add Domain Purchase & Custom Domain Setup Guide

requirements.text: Add a new “Domain Setup” page that explains (in English) how to buy a domain from any registrar and configure DNS to point the domain to this Internet Computer app (include step-by-step instructions and clearly state that domain purchase happens outside the app).
acceptanceCriteria: A new route is available (e.g., "/domain-setup") that renders a Domain Setup guide page.
The page content includes: (1) buy domain instructions, (2) DNS configuration steps, and (3) a clear note that the app cannot directly purchase domains.
All user-facing copy on the page is in English.
The page uses existing UI components/styling conventions (Tailwind + shadcn) and is readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add navigation access to the new “Domain Setup” page from the existing site navigation (add a link in the footer Support or Quick Links section).
acceptanceCriteria: The footer includes a visible “Domain Setup” link.
Clicking the link navigates to the Domain Setup page without a full page reload.

constraints: Do not attempt to programmatically purchase a domain; domain registration and billing must be handled externally (outside the app).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths (use composition/wrappers instead).
nonGoals: Implementing a registrar API integration for domain purchase.
Automated DNS changes or certificate management from within the app.
